ingredients: 1 cup All-Purpose Flour, or more if needed
1/2 pound Whole Milk Mozzarella Cheese, shredded
1 teaspoon EACH, sea salt, sugar, ground pepper and ground nutmeg
1/2 cup Fresh Italian Parsley, finely chopped
5 ounces Bag, Fresh Baby Spinach, chopped
6 Cloves Fresh Garlic, peeled & chopped fine
2- 28 ounces Cans, Crushed Tomatoes, preferably San Marzano type
1 teaspoon Each, salt and pepper, more if taste necessary
1/2 cup Grana Padano Cheese, grated or more if you like
